newsitem.title: USA: Ridgewood, N.J., utility seeks rate hike - paper.
newsitem.headline: Ridgewood, N.J., utility seeks rate hike - paper.

text.p: Ridgewood, N.J.'s water utility, which also serves Midland Park, Glen Rock, and Wyckoff, is seeking a 26 percent rate increase, the Bergen Record reported Tuesday.
The utility plans to ask the state's Local Finance Board to approve the higher rate, and does not foresee additional increases before 2001.
If approved, the increase would be to $2.29 per 1,000 gallons from $1.82.
Utility officials attributed the need for a rate increase to the costs associated with past capital projects.
